meanings: (글·글씨 등을) write, (시·편지 등을) compose, (적다) put[write] (sth) down, (간단히) jot sth down

meanings.meaning: A penny saved is a penny gained.

vlive.korean: 필터 안 쓰는 게 더 밝은 것 같아요, 그렇죠? I think it's brighter without a filter, right? 듣기 View video WOODZ (조승연) : 오늘도 들립니다.
vlive.english: I think it's brighter without a filter, right?

vlive.korean: [아이템 못 쓴 아이템 전...] - 얘들아 아이템 쓰는 게 도대체 뭐니? - 안 돼! [Item race where he can't use items] - Guys, how can I use an item? - No! 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.107
vlive.english: [Item race where he can't use items] - Guys, how can I use an item? - No!

vlive.korean: 이걸 쓰는 게... I think I'm going to go and use... 듣기 View video BLACKPINK : 꾸며봅시당🖤
vlive.english: I think I'm going to go and use...

vlive.korean: 닦고 나서 손 소독제 쓰는 게 낫지 않을까? Don't we have to wash first? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 오래 기다리셨습니다
vlive.english: Don't we have to wash first?

vlive.korean: [미리 미리 찬스를 빨리 쓰는 게 이득] 미리 찬스를 빨리 하는 게 좋지 않을까? why not get a hint now? 듣기 View video TWICE : TWICE REALITY "TIME TO TWICE" - Noraebang Battle EP.03
vlive.english: why not get a hint now?

examples.korean: I had so much fun writing. 발음듣기 글 쓰는 게 너무 재미있어요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I had so much fun writing. 발음

examples.korean: I don’t care if I make a mistake, so I’m not shy about using Korean. 발음듣기 저는 실수하는 것에 신경 안 쓰기 때문에 한국말 쓰는 게 두렵지 않죠. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I don’t care if I make a mistake, so I’m not shy about using Korean. 발음

examples.korean: She looks better with glasses. 발음듣기 그녀는 안경을 쓰는 게 더 보기 좋다 Neungyule
examples.english: She looks better with glasses. 발음

examples.korean: I feel very uncomfortable with chopsticks. 발음듣기 난 젓가락을 쓰는게 불편하거든요. Neungyule
examples.english: I feel very uncomfortable with chopsticks. 발음

examples.korean: Why save for your child’s college education when you can pay for it with a spending spree? 발음듣기 돈을 흥청망청 쓰는 게 어떻게 자녀의 대학 학자금 마련을 위한 저축이 될 수 있다는 것일까요? YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Why save for your child’s college education when you can pay for it with a spending spree? 발음
